Title: Warm Dragonfruit Pie
Description:
When I think of red dragon comfort food, I immediately think of the pies back at the Ruby Life Pools. You can always tell when our blacksmith, Krendisc, has downtime between orders--the entire mountain smells of delicious baked dragonfruit!

My pie may not be as good as his, but I am sure our ruby hatchling will love it. If you bring me the ingredients I will bake the best pie I can!
ObjectivesText: Gather Ripened Dragonfruit near the Ruby Life Pools and Pre-Made Pie Crust from Erugosa in Valdrakken, then bring them to Lasztak to bake a pie for the Ruby Hatchling.
